StringTable.Label: DreadLordsReturn_DreadLordsReturn_Dec
StringTable.String: A dormant Dreadlord colony has awoken. Stop them before they become too powerful and wipe out all life in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: DreadLordsReturn_DreadLordsReturn_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A dormant Dreadlord colony has awoken. Stop them before they become too powerful and wipe out all life in the galaxy.
